name: Hotelli
tag_list: hotel, hotel-urbano, decolar, hoteltonight, jetsetter, jet, setter, jet-setter, voyage-prive, voyage, prive, trave, destination, brazil, startup, hotels, discount, last-minute-deals, last-minute, last-minute-hotels, last-minute-travel, travel-website, tra
overview:
Hotelli is the 1st Last Minute Travel Website in Brazil.

Hotelli connects the Hotels and Inns that need to fulfill their occupancy while providing great deals to People that need to find a good place to rest that same day or weekend.

Through Hotelli it is possible to book a room and go straight to the Hotel, with no need to contact the Hotel for confirmation, the booking is immediate and guaranteed with the lowest rate possible.

Hotelli is the best and only alternative in Brazil for executives and people that need a good Hotel or Inn to stay overnight or for the next weekend with a guaranteed and automated booking date with last minute rates.

milestones.description: Hotelli just hit 100k subscribers in under 2 weeks
